com.hazelcast.crdt.pncounter

Class PNCounterImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.crdt.pncounter.PNCounterImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CRDT<PNCounterImpl>, DataSerializable, IdentifiedDataSerializable

    public class PNCounterImpl
extends Object
implements CRDT<PNCounterImpl>, IdentifiedDataSerializable
    PN (Positive-Negative) CRDT counter where each replica is identified by a String.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public CRDTTimestampedLong get(VectorClock observedTimestamps)
        Returns the current value of the counter.

        The method can throw a ConsistencyLostException when the state of this CRDT is not causally related to the observed timestamps. This means that it cannot provide the session guarantees of RYW (read your writes) and monotonic read.

        Parameters:
        observedTimestamps - the vector clock last observed by the client of this counter
        Returns:
        the current counter value with the current counter vector clock
        Throws:
        ConsistencyLostException - if this replica cannot provide the session guarantees

      • getAndAdd

        public CRDTTimestampedLong getAndAdd(long delta,
                                     VectorClock observedTimestamps)
        Adds the given value to the current value.

        The method can throw a ConsistencyLostException when the state of this CRDT is not causally related to the observed timestamps. This means that it cannot provide the session guarantees of RYW (read your writes) and monotonic read.

        Parameters:
        delta - the value to add
        observedTimestamps - the vector clock last observed by the client of this counter
        Returns:
        the current counter value with the current counter vector clock
        Throws:
        ConsistencyLostException - if this replica cannot provide the session guarantees

      • merge

        public void merge(PNCounterImpl other)
        Description copied from interface: CRDT
        Merges the state of a different replica into this CRDT. The merge method should not leave the CRDT in a failed state.
        Specified by:
        merge in interface CRDT<PNCounterImpl>
        Parameters:
        other - the CRDT to merge into this CRDT

      • markMigrated

        public boolean markMigrated(VectorClock vectorClock)
        Marks this CRDT as migrated. A migrated CRDT can no longer be mutated. For this CRDT to be marked as migrated, the provided vectorClock must be equal to the current vector clock.
        Parameters:
        vectorClock - a vector clock to compare the current clock to
        Returns:
        true if this CRDT has been marked as migrated, false otherwise

      • markMigrated

        public void markMigrated()
        Unconditionally marks this CRDT as migrated. A migrated CRDT can no longer be mutated.
